main event: A police officer on patrol spotted an unusual oblong-shaped object with red and white lights that made a rapid, sharp climb and headed west.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 3-5 times the size of a car and seemed to be reflecting light in a peculiar manner.
The object's path was described as dirt linear and its flight path as rapid, which was inconsistent with a typical aircraft.
The object appeared in the sky at about 30 degrees above the horizon to the east and disappeared from view behind trees on the left side.
The weather conditions at the time included a high thin broken cloud cover and a temperature that remained approximately the same between the surface and 1000 feet.
No photographs or physical evidence of the sighting were obtained.
sighted object: an oblong-shaped object with red and white lights
